description: The mechanical heart Happy and Charl destroy turns out to be giving Hades his power. Ultear uses her magic to return the Tenrou Tree to its original state, allowing Natsu, Lucy, Gray, Erza, Wendy, and Laxus to finally defeat the now powerless Hades. Makarov and the other injured guildmates return and order Grimoire Heart to leave Tenrou Island. As the Fairy Tail wizards celebrate and recover from their fight, Hades and the other defeated Grimoire Heart members discover Zeref on their ship.

titles.title: Le jour se lève sur Tenrôjima
